summary: CONSUMER CALLED COMPLAINING ABOUT HAVING PROBLEMS WITH A CAR SEAT RESTRAINT ARM. ALSO STATED THAT THE WHOLE ARM RESTRAINT CAME OFF AND THE SEAT IS SUPPOSED BE GOOD UNTIL 12/2004. MANUFACTURE WAS CONTACTED AND HAS STATED THAT THE PART THAT WAS BROKEN ON THE CAR SEAT IS NOT REPLACEABLE AND THE HE WILL NEED TO PURCHASE ANOTHER CAR SEAT.
